name: Naughty Pony Salon-Take Care Of Pets
name_original: Naughty Pony Salon-Take Care Of Pets
description:
Naughty Pony Salon is an educated animal care game.
It's morning time.Our adorable Pony is playing in mud.To clean Pony,remove her from mud first and then clean her.Use a soft brush to remove extra dust.Clean her hoofs using brush.Use water to clean her all over.Pay attention to her happiness meter.Check the hints and complete all activities.Enjoy your game,have fun!

Game Features:
- Educated meaning and tell the parents to company their children more when they are free
- Teach you to be brave when you are sick
- Comfortable and cute color matching
- Fluent and clearly frames
- Simple operations and there are some hints for you
